string.text: Traditional outfit of a bandit - a leather jacket with kevlar elements. It slightly increases bullet and splinter protection. It does not protect from anomalies.

SPECIAL SUIT. This jacket was taken from the body of a stalker who died in a Kissel anomaly. Having spent a long time in the anomaly, this jacket has acquired anomalous properties: it greatly accelerates the user's metabolism. Traditional bandit outfit - a leather jacket with attached kevlar elements. It slightly increases bullet and splinter protection.
SPECIAL SUIT. It is based on a standard stalker jacket but due to sewn-in thick felt strips, its protective properties are increased, especially in respect of gravitational anomalies.

SPECIAL SUIT. The lining of this jacket contains chainmail made of hardened wire. The chainmail provides excellent protection against bites and cuts, but is totally ineffective against bullets and anomalies. Besides, the metal makes the jacket heavier.
Bandit jacket
Animated jacket
Thick bandit jacket
Chainmail jacket

Produced by one of Kiev's defence research institutes and commissioned by the Duty faction. It is as simple and reliable as the standard PSZ-9 model, but due to the new materials, it provides good protection from bullets and splinters, as well as from weak anomalies. It has no breathing protection system, so its level of radiation protection is low.
SPECIAL SUIT. Special rubber added to the kevlar fabric makes it more resistant to cuts. Unlike standard kevlar, this suit provides excellent protection against bites and hits inflicted by monsters.
PSZ-9d Duty Armor
Rubberized Duty armor

A wonderful protective suit for the Zone. It combines excellent anomaly-proof and bullet-proof qualities. It includes the PSZ-9d suit, a closed cycle breathing system and an integrated system of anomalous field suppression. It provides good bullet and splinter protection. It has an average level of anomaly protection and a high level of radiation protection.
PSZ-9Md Universal Protection

A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specially designed for the Zone conditions. It is used by scientific expeditions and the eco-stalkers who cooperate with them. It has an integrated air-filtering and air-conditioning system. It is heat and electricity resistant, provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistant to chemically aggressive environments. It is not designed for combat, so it provides neither bullet, nor splinter protection.
SSP-99 Ecologist

A military exoskeleton prototype. It never went into serial production, because of extreme cost and some design flaws. It is however produced in small batches in small illegal factories outside of Ukraine. This is a third generation exoskeleton. The design defects which used to decrease its mobility were eliminated and the armor was reinforced. It provides excellent bullet and splinter protection. It has a low level of anomaly protection.
Exoskeleton

Stalker suit from the Merc faction. Its design is based on the suit used by the special forces of the Western armies. Due to a special treatment, its fabric provides better heat and radiation protection. Its protective properties are slightly better then those of the PSZ-7 military bulletproof suits.
SPECIAL SUIT. This suit is reinforced with a set of steel plates which improve protection from gunfire and monster bites. In all other respects, it is the standard suit of the Merc faction.

SPECIAL SUIT. This suit was specially designed for long trips. The trousers have integrated elastic ribbons which decrease the joint load during long walks. Some artifacts were also added (but no one knows exactly which ones). As a result the suit became practically weightless and acquired better protective characteristics.
Merc suit
Reinforced Merc suit
Modified Merc suit

This Skat-9M military suit is designed for assault operations in areas of increased anomalous activity. It includes a PSZ-12p heavy military bulletproof vest, an integrated compensation suit and a Sphere-12M helmet. It provides perfect protection from bullets and splinters and it doesn’t decrease the soldier’s mobility. It has a balanced system of anomaly protection.

SPECIAL SUIT. A light version of the military bulletproof vest made with super-modern titanium alloys. It is somewhat lighter then the standard bulletproof vest but provides the same reliable protection.
Military armored suit
Modified armored suit

Stalker suit from the Monolith faction. The producer is unknown. Its protective properties are slightly worse then those of the PSZ-9a military bulletproof vest. Its structure is similar to the popular neutral stalker suit which combine a bulletproof vest and a radiation protection suit. It provides good protection from gunfire. Its level of anomaly protection is low due to the absence of an air filtering system.

SPECIAL SUIT. A special model of the Monolith personal protection suit. It is made of advanced technology materials and has a prototype psi-protection. Its defensive properties are superior to the ones of some military bulletproof suits, besides, it can resist psi-attacks.
Monolith suit
Modified Monolith suit
An ordinary thick jacket, one of the many. It slightly increases bullet and splinter protection. It does not protect from anomalies.
Leather jacket

Modified SSP-99 suit. It provides increased body protection from bullets and splinters. It is designed for the guards working with scientific expeditions. It is heat and electricity resistant, provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistant to chemically aggressive environments.
SSP-99M suit

This suit was produced by one of Kiev's defence research institutes and represents an excellent alternative to stalker hand-made suits. It is an excellent combination of an bulletproof vest, a closed cycle breathing system and an integrated system of anomalous field suppression. Due to the perfect choice of the materials, it is the best suit in its class. It provides average bullet and splinter protection. It has an average level of anomaly protection. The only disadvantage is its price.
SEVA suit

A Berill-5M special forces suit modified for the Zone environment. It includes a PSZ-9a military bulletproof vest with beryllium coating and a Sphere-08 helmet. It is designed for assault operations in areas with high background radiation. Its level of anomaly protection is low.

SPECIAL SUIT. Even a small cut can have serious consequences in the Zone, but it is very risky to take off the chemical and radiation protection suits to treat the wound. This suit is designed to solve this problem. It has a lining impregnated with a mixture of disinfectants and coagulants. As a result, any wound is tended as if it was bandaged. In all other respects, it is a usual Berill-5M suit. The Berill-5M is a special forces suit modified for the Zone environment. It includes a PSZ-9a military bulletproof vest with beryllium coating and a Sphere-08 helmet.
Berill-5M armored suit
Healing Berill

Stalker suit. It is an effective combination of a light military bulletproof vest and of a rubberized fabric suit. It is reinforced with inserted kevlar plates and provides good protection from gunfire. It can also protect from a weak anomaly or radiation.

SPECIAL SUIT. Having spent a long time in an anomaly, this suit has acquired the capability to reflect bullets. It cannot stop a bullet completely, but it can reduce its energy before the physical contact thus protecting the user.
SPECIAL SUIT. The spectral stalker never uses medkits and all his wounds heal very quickly. He has an unusual suit he found in an anomaly. Or so the legend goes…

SPECIAL SUIT. A suit with additional radiation protection and bottles from a scientific protective suit. Probably, the stalker had no money to buy a scientific suit, so he modified his own, increased its psi protection.
Stalker suit
Enchanted suit
Spectral stalker suit
Hermetic suit

Reinforced stalker suit produced by the gunsmiths of the Freedom faction. It is made up of a medium military bulletproof vest plated with reinforcing zirconium elements which provide good protection from rifle bullets and splinters from medium and long range. The material of the suit consists of two layers: specially treated leather and fabric with asbestos yarn. The suit provides good protection from radiation and weak anomalies.
Guardian of Freedom suit

Light stalker suit produced by the gunsmiths of the Freedom faction. It consists of a light military bulletproof vest with reinforcing kevlar elements. It can protect from weak weapons. The fabric of the suit is treated with a special mixture which increases the anomaly resistance.
Wind of Freedom suit
